structural_unit_name.en: Institute of Molecular and Cell Biology

description.en: During the two semester period the PhD student participates at least in 10 seminars given by visiting lectures. 3 EAP is divided between 6 semesters, this means, that  during the 1., 2. and 3. study year evaluations 1 EAP is earned.
description.et: Doktorant osaleb kahe semestri jooksul vähemalt 10-l kutsutud väliskülalislektori poolt peetaval seminaril. 3EAP-d on jaotatud 6 semestri vahel, st 1.,2. ja 3. õppeaasta atesteerimistel saadakse  1 EAP.

objectives.en: The PhD student gains experience in scientific communication.

learning_outcomes.en: The PhD student who passed the course:
-will gain the overview of newest developments and results of research in his/her field of study
learning_outcomes.et: -omandab ülevaate oma eriala uuematest uurimissuundadest ja teadustulemustest

learning_outcomes.en: -is able to analyse critically the results of other scientists
-is able to use scientific terminology on the professional level

grade_preconditions.et: Doktorant osaleb  vähemalt 10-l kutsutud väliskülalislektori poolt peetaval seminaril.

grade_evaluation.et: Osalemine  vähemalt 10-l kutsutud väliskülalislektori poolt peetaval seminaril.
